body_html: Hi everyone. I was also using a Power8 with IBM's packages (https://www-01.ibm.com/common/ssi/cgi-bin/ssialias?htmlfid=POO03514WWEN&) which included Tensorflow 1.0.0 . I solved the problem by using CUDA8 for Power8, which is NOT(!!!!) the same for the general pc64_el architecture. You must use the cuda-repo-ubuntu1604-8-0-local-ga2_8.0.54-1_ppc64el-deb from https://developer.nvidia.com/cuda-downloads-power8 .

body: Hi everyone. I was also using a Power8 with IBM's packages (https://www-01.ibm.com/common/ssi/cgi-bin/ssialias?htmlfid=POO03514WWEN&) which included Tensorflow 1.0.0 . I solved the problem by using CUDA8 for Power8, which is NOT(!!!!) the same for the general pc64_el architecture. You must use the cuda-repo-ubuntu1604-8-0-local-ga2_8.0.54-1_ppc64el-deb from https://developer.nvidia.com/cuda-downloads-power8 .
